channel.title: Very... very strange problem
channel.description:
Well, I've made a pk server that I can host on two seperate ports. But theres some weird problem, there's a client required for the server. So, if i try to connect with that client, I get error. If i use the exact same IP and port with Silabsoft, it works?
Oh and yes, I've triple checked that I got the port and IP right.

item.title: Very... very strange problem
item.dc:creator: @Owner_of_Flamescape Owner of Flamescape
item.description:
@Owner_of_Flamescape wrote:

Oh i had that problem! Go into the client and change the port. It is most likely pre-set

Read full topic

item.title: Very... very strange problem
item.dc:creator: @Moo_Dragon Moo Dragon
item.description:
@Moo_Dragon wrote:

[quote=“davedave, post:7, topic:231901”][quote author=King Lingerz link=topic=305477.msg2447851#msg2447851 date=1221832570]
In the IP section type “localhost” without the " ". If that doesn’t work, theres something wrong with the server, if it does, you have done something wrong, like not Port Forwarded properly for example.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2008, 02:58:12 pm[/size][hr]Im now goin to restart my comp to try fix about 4 different fatal errors BRB
[/quote]

Well, I’ve tried different ports for portforwarding. Yes I’ve portforwarded before. I even host a server with no-ip… but for some reason I can’t get it to work.[/quote]
How can you host a server if your having trouble hosting it…?

Read full topic

item.title: Very... very strange problem
item.dc:creator: @davedave davedave
item.description:
@davedave wrote:

King Lingerz:

In the IP section type “localhost” without the " ". If that doesn’t work, theres something wrong with the server, if it does, you have done something wrong, like not Port Forwarded properly for example.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2008, 02:58:12 pm[/size][hr]Im now goin to restart my comp to try fix about 4 different fatal errors BRB

Well, I’ve tried different ports for portforwarding. Yes I’ve portforwarded before. I even host a server with no-ip… but for some reason I can’t get it to work.

Read full topic

It’s not silab compatible.
